{{infobox character | people=[[Noldor|Noldo]] | name=Mahtan | image=Karolina Węgrzyn - Mahtan-face-study.jpg | caption="Mahtan (face study)" by [[Karolina Węgrzyn]] | pronun=[[Quenya|Q]], {{IPA|[ˈmaxtan]}} | othernames=''Urundil'', ''Rusco'' ([[Quenya|Q]], [[epessë|epessi]]) | titles= | position= | location=[[Valinor]] | affiliation=''[[Aulendur]]'' | language=[[Quenya]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Nerdanel]] | gender=Male | height= | hair=Red brown | eyes= | clothing=Copper circlet | weapons= | steed= }} '''Mahtan''' was a [[Noldor]]in [[Elves|Elf]] and the father of [[Nerdanel]], the wife of [[Fëanor]].{{S|Feanor}} ==History== A skilled smith in [[Valinor]], Mahtan learned the arts of metal and stone work under the [[Valar|Vala]] [[Aulë]], and for this Mahtan was an ''[[Aulendur]]'' ("Servant of Aulë"). He wore a [[copper]] circlet around his head and was known for his fondness for the metal. Thus he was called ''Urundil'' - 'copper-lover'.{{PM|Shibboleth}}, note 61 Mahtan in turn taught Fëanor, the greatest of all Elven craftsmen, who—to Mahtan's regret—used this knowledge to forge the first weapons and armour in Valinor.{{S|Unrest}} Mahtan had a beard, which was unusual for an Elf, especially one as young as he. Elves could only grow beards from the third [[Elven life cycle|cycle of their lives]], while Mahtan was an exception in being only early in his second.{{VT|41b}}, p. 9 ==Etymology== The name ''Mahtan'' seems to come from the [[Quenya]] ''mahta-'' ("to handle"), a reference to the arts and skills of making. ==Other names== His devotion to Aulë led to him becoming an '''''Aulendur''''' ("Servant of Aulë") from ''[[-ndur]]'' ("to serve"). The earlier form of this name was Aulendil, which was later used by [[Sauron]] during his treachery to [[Númenor]]. His other name '''''Urundil''''' means "Copper-lover" from ''urun'' ("copper") and ''[[-ndil]]'' ("lover, friend").{{S|Elements}} His other [[epessë]] '''''Rusco''''' means "Fox", a reference to his red-brown hair.{{PM|Feanor}}{{rp|353}} ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| MHT | | MIR |y| FIN |y| IND | | | | | | | | | | | | |MHT='''MAHTAN'''
